remarks: Define the (right) divisibility relation in a ring.  Access to the left divisibility relation is available through ` ( ||r `` ( oppR `` R ) ) ` .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Dec-2014.)
statement:
df-dvdsr $p |- ||r = ( w e. _V |-> { <. x , y >. | ( x e. ( Base ` w ) /\ E. z e. ( Base ` w ) ( z ( .r ` w ) x ) = y ) } ) $.
$d w x y z $.
